metadata.title: CVE-2019-16393 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
SPIP before 3.1.11 and 3.2 before 3.2.5 mishandles redirect URLs in ecrire/inc/headers.php with a %0D, %0A, or %20 character.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-16393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.2.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-1').
